On 06/09/2012 11:08 PM, crawltst wrote:
> Hi
> I need to control Pausing, Resuming&  Checkpointing of H3 from outside of application (e.g. using a python script).
> Is it possible?
> How?

https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Heritrix+3.x+API+Guide#Heritrix3xAPIGuide-PauseJob

Python 2.7 example:
	
     import urllib, urllib2

     h3_url = 'https://127.0.0.1:8443'
     h3_user = 'admin'
     h3_password = 'secret'
     h3_job = 'myjob'
     data = {'action': 'pause'}

     mgr = urllib2.HTTPPasswordMgrWithDefaultRealm()
     mgr.add_password(None, h3_url, h3_user, h3_password)
     handler = urllib2.HTTPDigestAuthHandler(mgr)
     opener = urllib2.build_opener(handler)

     request = urllib2.Request(h3_url + '/engine/job/' + h3_job)
     request.add_header('Accept', 'application/xml')
     request.add_data(urllib.urlencode(data))

     xml_result = opener.open(request).read()
     print xml_result
